topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547ac1996368722b3a710100#post_547ac1996368722b3a710100
The Dark Kings arc was kind of disappointing as a whole.
None of them felt as threatening as Myotismon. And even he was kind of blase at best. I think that was the weakest part of Adventure. None of the villains felt like actual villains. They were more like inconveniences. And the fight scenes were kind of boring but that was more a case of the limitations of the time.
